## Version Impact

<!-- This helps determine the semantic version bump -->

- [ ] **Patch** - Bug fixes, refactoring, documentation (0.1.0 → 0.1.1)
- [ ] **Minor** - New features, backwards-compatible changes (0.1.0 → 0.2.0)
- [ ] **Major** - Breaking changes (0.1.0 → 1.0.0)
